Philips 70PUT8215/94 70 inch (177 cm) LED 4K TV Specifications

General
Brand Philips
Model 70PUT8215/94 70 inch (177 cm) LED 4K TV
Warranty 1 Year
Box Contents Television, Remote Control, Batteries, Wall Mount, User Manual & Warranty Card
Display
Type LED
Size(Diagonal) 70 Inch (177.8 cm, Ideal for 8-15 or Above feet viewing distance)
Resolution 4K, 3840 x 2160 Pixels
LED Backlight Type Ultra Slim LED
Refresh Rate 60 Hz
Brightness 300 Nits
Aspect Ratio 16 : 9
Horizontal Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
Vertical Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
3D TV No
Curved TV No
Ultra Slim TV No
Other Display Features HDR (High Dynamic Range), HDR 4K with Dolby Vision
Physical Design
Weight Without Stand 22.5 Kg
Weight With Stand 23 Kg
Dimensions With Stand(WxDxH) 1567.6 x 949 x 312.3 mm
Dimensions Without Stand(WxDxH) 1567.6 x 886.8 x 87.7 mm
Wall Mount Dimensions(WxDxH) 300 x 300 mm
Video
Digital TV Reception Formats DVB
Analog TV Reception Formats PAL, NTSC, SECAM
Video Formats Supported AVI, MKV, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MPEG-4, WMV
Image Formats Supported BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG
Upscaling Yes
Other Video Features Dolby Vision, HDR 10 Plus, HDR 10
Audio
Sound Technology DTS Play-Fi
Audio Formats Supported AAC, MP3, WAV, WMA
No. of Speakers 2
Output per Speaker 8 W
Total Speaker Output 16 W
Speaker Frequency Range 50 - 60 Hz
Other Smart Audio Features Auto volume leveller: Balance, Clear Sound, Dolby Atmos, Ultra Surround
Connectivity /Ports
USB Ports 2(Side)
USB Supports Audio, Video, Image
HDMI Ports 1(Side), 3(Rear)
Digital/Optical Audio Output Ports 1(Rear)
Headphone/Speaker output ports 1(Side)
Ethernet Sockets 1
Smart TV Features
Smart TV Yes
Wifi Present Yes
Band Support Dual Band
Wifi-Direct Support Yes
Miracast/Screen Mirroring Support Yes
Bluetooth Yes
Bluetooth Version 4.2
Processor Type Quad Core
Inbuilt Apps Yes, Netflix, Youtube, Hotstar, Google Play Movies, Prime Video, ErosNow
Facebook and Social Media Integration Yes
Games Yes
Voice Recognition Yes
Other Smart Features AllShare, Display Mirroring, DLNA, Easylink (HDMI-CEC), One-touch Connect, Screen Casting, SmartShare, SmartView, WiFi Direct, Android
Remote
Cell Requirement 2 AAA
Other Remote Features Smart Control
Power Supply
Voltage Requirement 220 - 240 V
Frequency Requirement 50 - 60 Hz
Power Consmption Standby 0.5 W
